HostHOP.com - Specializing in gigabit VPS hosting, including Windows and Linux/*NIX.

Come visit us at HostHOP.com!

We are a premium bandwidth host specializing in VPS hosting, dedicated servers and colocation. Our goal is to create long-term, mutually beneficial relationships with our clients, and to provide a superior level of service to you and your enterprise. We are NOT a high-volume hosting company, and you are NOT just a number! Because we are a small, privately-owned corporation, we can provide more flexibility and better cater to your individual needs than many of the larger hosting companies.

We also provide a full 1-Gigabit port to EVERY server/node!

All of our hardware is enterprise-grade and fully redundant, providing N+1 redundancy all the way! Security and reliability are our top priorities (other than customer satisfaction, of course), which is why you won't find anything but Cisco switches/routers in our network. For this same reason, we also provide protection from our managed firewalls for all our clients at no additional charge. Customers with special access requirements may simply open a support ticket to have custom ports forwarded to their IP(s).

Tour our facilities by clicking here.

We offer a 15-day money-back guarantee with no questions asked.
